digest: Read and draw various 3D model formats

description.desc1: Reads and draws a variety of 3D model formats such as OBJ and Collada (see complete list under notes)
description.desc2: Only tesselated polygons are drawn and surfaces that are not tesselated are converted before drawing
description.desc3: This node should be prefered for virtual projections over its sister node 'Model'.

file.descript: select the model file to draw. the file needs to be located inside the ~/_assets/_model folder. you can also drag'n drop files, which will be copied into the _model folder and autmatically selected.

RenderGroup.descript: set the render group. Capture/Beamer/3DViewer have an equivalent in which you can choose which group to render.

displaylist.descript: enables displaylist - can speed up drawing

drawgroup.descript: if the model has drawgroups, choose.

polymode.descript:
<li>polygons - only faces
	<li>lines - only lines 
	<li>points - only vertices

axes.descript: show axes of the models origin

animate.descript: if model has an animation, play it

nodeaxes.descript: if modesl has nodes, show axes of the nodes

matrixouput.descript: ouputs the faces as a jitter matrix on the dumpout outlet

fileWatch.descript: watches the model file. when it changes, it will be autmatically reloaded

publish transformation.descript: publishes this mode transformation as a transformation node

Notes.note2: <li>Wavefront Object Model File - .obj is the prefered file format. SPARCK likes it.
